## About Visit Makkah

Visit Makkah is a free, comprehensive resource helping Muslims plan their pilgrimage to Makkah. Our content combines local expertise from Makkah residents with modern AI technology to provide personalized guidance.

We are NOT a travel agency. We are an educational resource.

## What We Offer

- **Umrah Guides**: Complete step-by-step instructions for performing Umrah
- **Hajj Guides**: Comprehensive Hajj preparation and ritual guides
- **Prayer Times**: Real-time prayer schedules for Makkah
- **Hotel Information**: Accommodation recommendations by distance to Masjid al-Haram
- **Visa Guidance**: Country-specific Umrah/Hajj visa requirements
- **Local Tips**: Insider knowledge from Makkah residents
- **AI Trip Planner**: Personalized pilgrimage planning assistant
- **Ramadan Guides**: Special guidance for Umrah during Ramadan

## Key Facts

- Umrah can be performed any time of year (unlike Hajj)
- Umrah during Ramadan equals the reward of Hajj (Hadith)
- The four rituals of Umrah: Ihram, Tawaf, Sa'i, Halq/Taqsir
- Masjid al-Haram is the largest mosque in the world
- The Kaaba is the qibla (direction of prayer) for all Muslims
